IonGlass Screen Protector for iPhone 11/XR - Black (Clear/Glossy)

Stronger than tempered glass, IonGlass ensures your touchscreen is protected thanks to this extremely durable screen protector for iPhone 11/XR.
It offers complete, edge-to-edge protection, is equipped with an oleophobic coating to reduce fingerprints and smudges.
